overview: 3 Mini-stories: A Boy, A Dog, and A Frog; Frog On His Own; Frog, Where Are You?  "A Boy, A Dog, and A Frog"  A small boy and his dog spend a day trying to capture a playful frog at a nearby pond.  "Frog On His Own"  With boy and dog in hot pursuit, a frog discovers the joys of motorboating, plays tricks on a magician, goes to a picnic, visits a baby, and alarms adults while amusing children along the way.  "Frog, Where Are You?"  Frog escapes from a life sentence in a jar. Join frog as he finds adventure and romance after the great escape.
tagline: A boy and his dog embarks on short adventures with a frog.
title: Mercer Mayer Frog Stories
